description: Relocate the security group API to be served as one of the core APIs.
title: Relocate security groups API to core

comments.content: Relocate the security group API to be served as one of the core APIs.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zyluo

comments.content: This isn't necessarily a bug in the code. We can consider this when we design the v3 api, but there is nothing to 'patch' in the codebase.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
